2852344585.name: AR-23 Liberator
2852344585.description: The SEAF standard assault rifle, balancing power, fire rate, and weight for a reliable weapon against smaller targets.

1676113140.name: AR-23P Liberator Penetrator
1676113140.description: A modified Liberator featuring a scope and firing armor-piercing rounds, to help users take down armored targets.

376039023.name: AR-23C Liberator Concussive
376039023.description: A modified Liberator featuring explosive rounds and a red-dot sight. Trades increased damage for increased recoil.

2088854385.name: SG-8 Punisher
2088854385.description: A powerful dual magazine pump-action shotgun, with limited armor penetration. Ideal for small and fast targets.

3955657629.name: SG-8P Punisher Plasma
3955657629.description: A modified Punisher shotgun firing exploding plasma rounds. Fire carefully - exploding plasma can injure squadmates.

2246547985.name: SG-8S Slugger
2246547985.description: A modified Punisher shotgun firing heavy, high-damage slug rounds. Perfect for punching holes in big targets.

1182300424.name: SG-225 Breaker
1182300424.description: A fully-automatic shotgun with a high rate of fire, excellent for controlling crowds. Requires frequent reloading.

3068666625.name: SG-225IE Breaker Incendiary
3068666625.description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing incendiary projectiles. Generates heat during use, so limited to burst fire.

3814689025.name: SG-225SP Breaker Spray&Pray
3814689025.description: A modified Breaker shotgun firing birdshot, small pellets which saturate an area to clear up smaller targets.

999487482.name: ARC-12 Blitzer
999487482.description: This shotgun blasts a wide burst of high-voltage electricity that arcs between all units—enemy or otherwise—within range.

2.name: MP-98 Knight
2.description: A submachine gun with an extremely high rate of fire, which can be operated with one hand. Ideal for multitasking.

2821209932.name: SMG-37 Defender
2821209932.description: A high-caliber submachine gun which can be fired with one hand. Has a relatively low rate of fire.

2307301438.name: R-63 Diligence
2307301438.description: This high-caliber marksman rifle trades magazine capacity and rate of fire for powerful, accurate shots.

924530093.name: R-63CS Diligence Counter Sniper
924530093.description: A modified Diligence rifle offering increased damage, but a reduced rate of fire. Fires a single bullet at a time.

3866352840.name: LAS-5 Scythe
3866352840.description: A laser rifle firing a continuous beam. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

1794436168.name: LAS-16 Sickle
1794436168.description: A laser rifle, firing in short bursts. Does not need reloading, but if it overheats a new heat sink must be fitted.

925809350.name: PLAS-1 Scorcher
925809350.description: A plasma rifle, firing a bolt of superheated gas which explodes on impact. Avoid standing in proximity to the blast.

2121387072.name: JAR-5 Dominator
2121387072.description: Firing jet-propelled rounds, the Dominator trades fire rate and magazine capacity for increased damage per projectile.

2640366401.name: BR-14 Adjudicator
2640366401.description: An accurate, armor-penetrating rifle, the BR-14 Adjudicator delivers righteous judgement to medium-sized enemies, though its restrictive magazine limits its effectiveness against large groups.

339272294.name: R-36 Eruptor
339272294.description: This bolt-action rifle fires jet-assisted shells that explode shrapnel in all directions upon impact. Not recommended for close-quarters use.

1942567317.name: CB-9 Exploding Crossbow
1942567317.description: Fires powerful exploding bolts that do maximum damage upon direct impact. Gravity must be accounted for when aiming.

1920374015.name: AR-61 Tenderizer
1920374015.description: A high-caliber assault rifle with a restrictive magazine size but more stopping power.

942049262.name: SMG-72 Pummeler
942049262.description: Fires concussive rounds that stagger enemies. Slower rate of fire than other SMGs.

2887941494.name: PLAS-101 Purifier
2887941494.description: A plasma rifle firing a bolt of superheated gas, which can be charged by holding down the trigger. Charging up a shot fully makes the bolt explode on impact.

1160920394.name: AR-23A Liberator Carbine
1160920394.description: A compact version of the Liberator designed for increased viability in close quarters. Has an increased fire rate at the cost of higher spread.

1321109120.name: SG-451 Cookout
1321109120.description: A pump shotgun that fires a burst of incendiary phosphorus pellets, setting targets ablaze.

4108040377.name: FLAM-66 Torcher
4108040377.description: A lightweight flamethrower. Shoots pressurized fuel through a dispersion nozzle into an open flame.

122941246.name: SG-20 Halt
122941246.description: A humane compliance weapon with two seperate magazines: one for armor-penetrating flechette rounds and one for stun rounds.

725205791.name: SMG-32 Reprimand
725205791.description: A heavy-duty submachine gun that fires large-caliber rounds, with a slower rate of fire to manage the high recoil. Ideal for use at close to medium range

4161086429.name: R-2124 Constitution
4161086429.description: This ceremonial rifle is modeled after antique relics from pre-Democratic times. It is traditionally gifted to every citizen upon turning 16 to encourage service.

9906.name: StA-52 Assault Rifle
9906.description: An assault rifle with a high-capacity drum magazine, good for providing sustained fire. Produced by Stäl Arms.

9907.name: StA-11 SMG
9907.description: A submachine gun with a helical-feed magazine, which gives the weapon a higher ammo capacity while making it more front-heavy. Produced by Stäl Arms.

9908.name: PLAS-39 Accelerator Rifle
9908.description: A high-precision burst-fire plasma rifle that must be charged to fire.

1005.name: LAS-17 Double-Edge Sickle
1005.description: A LAS-16 Sickle model with all overheating protections conveniently removed, allowing for far longer bursts of fire. Does more damage when overheating, at the cost of slightly burning the user.

1102.name: R-6 Deadeye
1102.description: A mighty rifle with a signature lever-action enabling single round reload. Powerful precision suited to mid- and long-range combat.

1205.name: R-2 Amendment
1205.description: A semi-automatic ceremonial rifle equipped with a bayonet. Can be set to fire in three shot bursts, to easily conduct the Fallen Hero's Salute.

1306.name: AR-32 Pacifier
1306.description: A large-capacity assault rifle firing humane stun rounds. Reports of lethal incidents have been thoroughly debunked.

1405.name: VG-70 Variable
1405.description: A speed-loaded volley gun with three different firing modes and three different RPM options. Warning: recoil varies significantly between firing modes.

1506.name: MA5C Assault Rifle
1506.description: Often showcased in the "Obedient Democracy Support Troopers" cartoon, this assault rifle comes with a convenient ammo counter and compass. Produced by Martian Armory.

1507.name: M7S SMG
1507.description: An SMG that fires caseless ammunition and is equipped with a non-removable suppressor. Produced by Martian Armory.

1515.name: M90A Shotgun
1515.description: A top-loaded shotgun prominently featured in the final episode of "Obedient Democracy Support Troopers". Produced by Martian Armory

1605.name: AR-2 Coyote
1605.description: A reliable assault rifle with an antique iron sight, firing incendiary ammunition.
